title: Hold Me When The Full Moon Rises
alternative_title: 보름달이 뜨면 안아주세요 ; Hug Me When the Full Moon Rises
status: 보름달이 뜨면 안아주세요 ; Hug Me When the Full Moon Rises
description:
Description :
        Blair, notorious for his debauchery, is cursed to suffer from unbearable heat unless he has intercourse every night of the full moon. This curse began after he returned from being kidnapped by wolves in the forest as a child. Blair believes it was the young wolf he met there who cursed him. One night, after failing to find a partner to relieve his heat, a strange man grabs Blair from behind. With his bare chest, long hair, and suspicious aura, the man claims Blair is his mate. "I found you, my mate."
